title: Gols e melhores momentos da derrota do Cuiab√° diante do Palestino na Sul-Americana
text:
Gols e melhores momentos da derrota do Cuiab√° diante do Palestino na Sul-Americana
Auriverde tamb√©m foi derrotado na primeira partida no Chile
Lance!
O
Cuiab√° perdeu para o Palestino, do Chile, por 2 a 1, e foi eliminado nos playoffs de oitavas de final da Sul-Americana, na noite desta quinta-feira (25). Os gols dos chilenos, na Arena Pantanal, foram marcados por Marabel, Gonzalo Sosa, enquanto Andr√© Lu√≠s descontou para o Auriverde. ‚û°Ô∏è Siga o Lance! no WhatsApp e acompanhe em tempo real as principais not√≠cias do esporte

author: Estela Ru√≠z D√≠az
title: Lago Yguaz√∫, con varias alternativas para refrescarse en d√≠as de verano
text:
Wilson Ferreira
ALTO PARAN√Å
Para huir del intenso calor de enero, no necesariamente los este√±os deben salir del departamento o cruzar la frontera al Brasil. Las costas del lago Yguaz√∫, al oeste de Alto Paran√°, presentan una variada oferta distribuida entre los distritos de Yguaz√∫ y Juan E. O‚ÄôLeary, todos ubicados a menos de una hora de Ciudad del Este. Estos espacios aseguran, no muy lejos de casa, una perfecta oportunidad de pasar un fin de semana entre amigos o en familia, dentro un ambiente sumamente agradable y fresco.
En su mayor√≠a, estos atractivos son gestionados por emprendimientos privados que buscan brindar experiencias √∫nicas, ofreciendo sitios para alojamiento, distracci√≥n, eventos art√≠sticos, mucha m√∫sica, y la pr√°ctica de deportes tanto en el lago propiamente como en las costas de arena. Los espacios rodeados de naturaleza, aire puro, con aguas cristalinas, aseguran un buen descanso a pocos kil√≥metros de la capital departamental.
Es as√≠ que en el distrito de Juan Emilio O‚ÄôLeary, a lo largo de las costas del Yguaz√∫, destacan tres lugares ideales para disfrutar del merecido descanso. El club N√°utico Takuaro, ubicado a 3.600 metros de la ruta PY02, es una de las opciones a disposici√≥n de los altoparanaenses. Rodeado de un parque natural con √°rboles nativos, este lugar se convierte en un espacio perfecto para el relax en familia, ofreciendo incluso un sector exclusivo para la recreaci√≥n de los ni√±os. M√°s informaci√≥n sobre costos y dem√°s precisiones se pueden comunicar al (0973)674-425.
Otras opciones tur√≠sticas en el mismo margen del lago Yguaz√∫, siempre en O‚ÄôLeary, son el Parque Recreativo Lago Azul y Nativa Nautic Club, ambos ubicados en la compa√±√≠a Takuaro. Este √∫ltimo espacio, considerado pionero en el rubro, se destaca por su amplia infraestructura con quinchos en la playa, miradores y bungalows, proporcionando un espacio completo con servicios de guardacostas y vallas de seguridad. Para tener precios y dem√°s servicios del primer complejo, la l√≠nea de comunicaci√≥n habilitado es el (0973) 865-210.
Todos estos lugares cuentan con hospedajes, diversos juegos acu√°ticos, cantinas, quinchos para hacer asado totalmente equipado, canchas de f√∫tbol y v√≥ley, adem√°s de las hermosas playas de arena. Cada servicio tiene un costo. Los n√∫meros telef√≥nicos se pueden consultar cada servicio e ir armando un presupuesto ajustado a la necesidad y disponibilidad de recurso de cada persona.
M√ÅS Opciones. En el distrito de Yguaz√∫, a 40 kil√≥metros de Ciudad del Este, tambi√©n se afianza como una opci√≥n tur√≠stica para el verano en el Alto Paran√°. Aqu√≠, diversas inversiones privadas a orillas del lago, gestionadas por la Asociaci√≥n Tur√≠stica de Yguaz√∫ (Asistur), vienen trabajando hace varios a√±os con mucha creatividad para crear circuitos tur√≠sticos y desarrollar eventos durante todo el a√±o.
Uno de los sitios destacados es el Parque Pikypo, ubicado a la altura del kil√≥metro 39, a unos 4.000 metros de la ruta PY02, ofrece a los turistas una experiencia √∫nica al mostrar la naturaleza, historia y elementos culturales de los migrantes japoneses en la regi√≥n.
El parque recreativo cuenta con una extensi√≥n de cinco hect√°reas, donde los visitantes pueden disfrutar de la playa con arena blanca al borde del lago Yguaz√∫, canchas de v√≥ley, f√∫tbol, paseos en kayak, botes a pedal, √°reas de camping y un bungalow con capacidad para cinco personas. Tambi√©n ofrece servicio de almuerzo, previa reserva. La atenci√≥n para consultas es de 09:00 a 19:00, de lunes a viernes al (0983) 508-704.
Adem√°s, el parque Ito, ubicado a 12 kil√≥metros de la ruta PY02, se erige como otra opci√≥n con bungalows de estilo japon√©s y diversas actividades como acampar, alquilar botes, kayak, senderismo y degustaci√≥n de platos nacionales y japoneses.
El visitante puede acampar en el sitio, alquilar botes, kayak, hacer senderismo, paseos a caballo y degustar variados platos de la gastronom√≠a nacional y japonesa. Pueden acceder a m√°s informaciones en las redes sociales del parque Ito o contactando al tel√©fono (0985) 485-001.
En el mismo distrito otra opci√≥n a conocer el Parque Asahi. Su nombre significa sol de la ma√±ana, traducido del japon√©s al espa√±ol y est√° a pocos kil√≥metros de la ruta PY07, ingresando por el km 39 del distrito de Yguaz√∫. M√°s informaci√≥n se puede encontrar en el n√∫mero (0983) 508-704.
Tambi√©n cuenta con servicios de bungalows, √°reas de quinchos y la amplia y limpia playa para disfrutar con toda la familia. Igualmente, los que cuentan con embarcaciones, moto y jet sky, y otros materiales para deportes n√°uticos pueden aprovechar las aguas del lago Yguaz√∫ para un d√≠a de relax en contacto con el sol y la naturaleza.

author: SWI swissinfo.ch
title: Scarred by 2020 Hindu-Muslim riots, India district voters want peace - SWI swissinfo.ch
text:
Scarred by 2020 Hindu-Muslim riots, India district voters want peace
reuters_tickers This content was published on May 25, 2024 - 14:53 3 minutes
By Shivam Patel
NEW DELHI (Reuters) ‚Äì Suhel Mansuri, who carries scars from Hindu-Muslim riots that killed dozens in his district of India‚Äôs capital in 2020, says his vote on Saturday in national elections was for ‚Äúpeace and brotherhood‚Äù as divisive religious rhetoric rises.
Mansuri and his brother were surrounded by a crowd during the riots in Delhi‚Äôs most densely populated district and beaten with iron rods and bricks, resulting in multiple bone fractures.
Saturday‚Äôs vote is the first since the riots in which at least 53 people, mostly Muslims, were killed and more than 500 injured as crowds roamed the streets for days, attacking each other with swords and guns, and setting buildings on fire.
‚ÄúI don‚Äôt want anyone to suffer like this ever again,‚Äù said Mansuri, 29, a Muslim who has a small clothing business in the Mustafabad area. ‚ÄúPeople forget that we‚Äôre all just the same as the next person when they are incited by hateful speeches.‚Äù
Rhetoric focussing on religion and inequality has dominated much of India‚Äôs massive seven-phase vote running through June 1, as Prime Minister Narendra Modi‚Äôs Hindu-nationalist Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) faces accusations of targeting minority Muslims in its campaign.
The Northeast Delhi constituency elected a BJP lawmaker in the past two national elections, in 2014 and 2019.
Modi, favoured to become only the second person to win three consecutive terms as India‚Äôs prime minister, referred to Muslims as ‚Äúinfiltrators‚Äù and people who have ‚Äúmore children‚Äù in a speech last month. He later denied targeting the group that constitutes about 200 million of majority-Hindu India‚Äôs 1.4 billion people.
‚ÄúI want to vote for peace and brotherhood. It‚Äôs difficult that the BJP will garner any votes here,‚Äù said Mansuri, in a thought echoed by voters in Mustafabad, including some Hindus.
Mithilesh, 42, a Hindu woman who gave only her first name, said she feared for her safety during the riots as a crowd stabbed two youths to death on her street while she was locked inside her house with her daughter-in-law.
‚ÄúWe heard their screams and were scared of what would happen to us. Our member of parliament at the time was from the BJP, who wants votes again, but we will not vote for him.‚Äù
Sabir Ali, 42, a Muslim tailor, said Modi‚Äôs speeches are just political rhetoric. ‚ÄúBut if he thinks Muslims will vote for him despite these speeches, then he is mistaken.‚Äù
In the nearby Jaffarabad area, Muslim grocery store owner Wasim Raja, 36, said high inflation was his main concern, as his business had taken a hit.
‚ÄúThe Hindu-Muslim issue has always been there and we are all voting for Congress this time, but despite that the BJP will likely win,‚Äù he said.
Support for the BJP, which looks set to return to power, was high in Hindu-dominated neighbourhoods as voters spoke of national pride and praised India‚Äôs economic growth.
‚ÄúHindus have awakened now because of Modi, and this fire will not die down,‚Äù said Akash Kumar Kashyap, 48, who runs a transport business in the Bhajanpura area.
‚ÄúModi has improved the economy and infrastructure. He‚Äôs grown India‚Äôs stature globally, so we like him for that,‚Äù said Mahesh Chand Barthwal, 35, who works in a law firm.

author: Eurosport_UK
title: Manchester United midfielder Mason Mount reveals latest injury setback - 'I worked hard to get my fitness back' - Eurosport
text: Manchester United midfielder Mason Mount reveals latest injury setback - 'I worked hard to get my fitness back' Mason Mount started the Community Shield and both of Manchester United's opening two Premier League games. However, the midfielder will not feature in their mouth-watering clash with Liverpool after revealing that he sustained an injury in their loss to Brighton and Hove Albion last week. Mount revealed the extent of his injury on social media. Mason Mount insists he will do all he can to return to full fitness after suffering an injury in Manchester United's match against Brighton and Hove Albion. The Red Devils fell to a [2-1 defeat against the Seagulls](https://www.tntsports.co.uk/football/premier-league/2024-2025/brighton-hove-albion-2-1-manchester-united-joao-pedro-heads-stoppage-time-winner-to-inflict-defeat-o_sto10310299/story.shtml)at Amex Stadium last weekend, with Mount replaced by new signing Joshua Zirkzee at the start of the second half. Mount's Old Trafford career has been blighted by injuries since arriving at the club from Chelsea in July 2023. The 25-year-old stressed that he wanted to be the one to let fans know about the setback in a social media post. "During the last game I picked up a minor muscle issue," he wrote on social media. "I've had it checked and it looks like I'll be out for a few games. "Leading up to and during pre-season, I worked hard to get my fitness back to where it needs to be and I felt re-energised, sharp and ready. "I wanted you to hear it directly from me how frustrated I am, as I expect you are too. I will do everything possible to be back in the best shape and help the team." Mount was in Erik ten Hag's starting XI for the Community Shield and featured in both of their opening two Premier League games this season. The [midfielder joined United from Chelsea for a reported ¬£60 million](https://www.tntsports.co.uk/football/transfers/2023-2024/manchester-united-clinch-60m-mason-mount-signing-from-chelsea-in-first-move-of-the-summer_sto9673979/story.shtml)having scored 27 goals in 129 Premier League appearances for the Blues. United are currently 11th in the Premier League table with one win and one defeat to their name. Ten Hag's side beat Fulham 1-0 in the opening game of the Premier League campaign. They will face rivals Liverpool at Old Trafford on Sunday. --- Watch the 2024/25 Premier League season live on TNT Sports and [discovery+](https://get.discoveryplus.com/gb/watch-tnt-sports-on-discoveryplus?utm_campaign=UK-TNT-D1-TNT-C7-TNT-BAU-DR-W-Football-Undefined-240101-NA&utm_medium=referral&utm_source=tntsports.co.uk&utm_content=story-content-text-subscribe&vid=4y9gmh3zfg8mqrm8&cid=0ee1b05714eadfd3193bf34fbc4e5980&c=%7B%22875074%22%3A%220%22%2C%221086912%22%3A%221348017%22%2C%221284295%22%3A%221592332%22%2C%221286521%22%3A%221595043%22%7D) Related Topics Share this article Advertisement Advertisement
